attributes.action: 3 fishing rods for one fishing license  in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
We've just had news in that from Spring of 2017, the rod licence will be increased to cover 3 rods, a move that will please carp and specimen anglers alike 

http://www.fishery.co.uk/n…/say-good-bye-to-two-rod-licences
Say Good Bye To Two Rod Licences
Thursday January 21st, 2016


rod-licenceWhen it was raised in parliament this week, Fisheries Minister George Eustice confirmed that the changes to the licence will take place from April 2017,
attributes.background:
In Northern Ireland  part of the British isles   we have to buy  two  rod licenses to  fish  three rods  

When it was raised in parliament this week, Fisheries Minister George Eustice confirmed that the changes to the licence will take place from April 2017,
